name: @teawithsand/lngext
description: Package with utils, which contains generic non-specific utils

scripts.fix: npm run format:fix && npm run lint:fix
scripts.pre-commit-check: npm run build:check && npm run lint:cached && npm run format:check:cached
scripts.pre-push-check: npm run build:check && npm run lint:cached && npm run format:check:cached && npm run test
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && npm run lint && npm run format:check && npm run test

author: teawithsand
